properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and validation

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: riot.api.key
properties.description: Riot Games API key for accessing League of Legends data

properties.name: minio.bucket-name
properties.description: MinIO bucket name for file storage

properties.name: springdoc.api-docs.path
properties.description: Path to the OpenAPI documentation in JSON format

properties.name: springdoc.swagger-ui.path
properties.description: Path to the Swagger UI interface

properties.name: springdoc.swagger-ui.tryItOutEnabled
properties.description: Enable 'Try it out' button by default

properties.name: springdoc.swagger-ui.syntaxHighlight.activated
properties.description: Enable syntax highlighting in Swagger UI

properties.name: springdoc.show-actuator
properties.description: Show Spring Boot Actuator endpoints in Swagger

properties.name: google.ai.api.key
properties.description: Google AI API key for performance analysis features
